cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.current_location: about 975 miles ESE of Cape Fear, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the southwest Atlantic and aiming for the North Carolina/South Carolina coastline

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach SC northward to the North Carolina–Virginia border, including the Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds
weather_observation.warning_coast: None issued as of this advisory
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South Carolina and North Carolina coasts, with swell and rip-current impacts extending southward to the Georgia coast
weather_observation.wind: Low (≤15%) chance of tropical-storm-force gusts late Friday into Saturday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1-2 ft possible; major inundation not expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Outer rainbands could drop 1-3 inches of rain, locally higher
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous surf and rip currents along the Georgia beaches
